title: Add setup validation for required CRM fields with guided remediation

sections.text: Implement a setup validation step that checks whether all required canonical fields (e.g., stage, close date, amount, owner, last activity/updated date) are mapped and populated at acceptable rates before enabling forecasting, next-best-action, and risk alerts. When gaps are detected, surface actionable guidance (e.g., suggest alternate discovered fields from GOLD-67, recommend enabling CRM field history tracking, or allow marking a field as optional with impact warnings). Block completion only for truly critical missing fields and persist validation results for audit/debugging.
